text: tapa'i bhannus ki timra sajhedaraharumadhye yasto kohi cha jasale satyako marga dekha'una saktacha? Bhanidinus ki allahale nai satyako marga dekha'umcha. Ani ke jasale satyako marga dekha'umcha, tyo yasa yogya cha ki tyasako anusarana gariyos athava tyo jasala'i jabasam'ma marga na dekha'iyos tabasam'ma aphai bato pa'umdaina? Tasartha timila'i ke bha'eko cha, timi kasto phaisala gardachau
